g.text:
Set to ptc6 with 'subroutinE'
values: 2,25,50,100,125,150 refresh mode
screen: Obsverve the ptc functions in 2d

svg.g:
/* text what to do */ screen: first step see all formatted point and transform to 3d. secondly just highight point needed
* move them accordingly to the given wxm plot size
* add possible connection between points connecting the vertices (points) *Exp*> 'fofina2 foBrad' plot two layers see the possible connection to transform up to 2d
* enable 'experimentRAW11 ...
hexagon plane adjustable area clientX : 0 clientY : 0 screenX : 0 screenY : 0

g.text: fit Haskell vector field of experiment3 into Svg
